name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pokemon Emerald Waterfall Pixel Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the beauty of the Hoenn region with a pixelated waterfall scene inspired by Pokemon Emerald! 🌊🌲✨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the nostalgic world of Pokemon Emerald with this charming pixel art live wallpaper. Featuring a tranquil waterfall from the Hoenn region, this extension brings back memories of exploring lush landscapes, catching Pokemon, and discovering hidden areas. Ideal for Pokemon fans and retro gaming enthusiasts, this wallpaper immerses you in the serene beauty of a classic scene every time you open a new tab.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Pixel Wallpaper: Stunning waterfall scene in pixel art style, inspired by Pokemon Emerald’s Hoenn region.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Add your own shortcuts for quick access to favorite sites.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search the web directly from your Pokemon-themed tab.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Retro-style clock and date add a touch of nostalgia to your browsing.
🔗 Quick Access Links: “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” links located in the lower left corner for easy navigation.
Revisit the adventures of Pokemon Emerald with each new tab. This extension merges serene pixel visuals with handy features, making it perfect for Pokemon fans who want a peaceful touch to their browsing.
